      Constructor for this validity checker
      Parameters:
      certificate - certificate being checked for validity
      issuer - issuer certificate for the CA issuing the target certificate
      crlCache - the CRL cache used to obtain CRL data
      propertyChangeListeners - listeners providing callback when using Runnable implementation
